CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Emergency Room Patients relative to Pediatric Patients?
SRP.A: Emergency Room Patients is {below} Pediatric Patients in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Outpatient Visitors relative to Emergency Room Patients?
SRP.A: Outpatient Visitors is {below} Emergency Room Patients in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Wellness Program Participants relative to Outpatient Visitors?
SRP.A: Wellness Program Participants is {above} Outpatient Visitors in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total patient satisfaction?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Emergency Room Patients}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total patient satisfaction?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Acute Care Patients}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Emergency Room Patients's maximum Patient Satisfaction in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Emergency Room Patients's maximum Patient Satisfaction is in {1966}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Emergency Room Patients's minimum Patient Satisfaction in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Emergency Room Patients's minimum Patient Satisfaction is in {1965}.

NC.Q: Between 1985 and 1988, did the total Patient Satisfaction experience a larger or smaller change than between 1970 and 1990?
NC.A: The change in total patient satisfaction between 1985 and 1988 was {larger} than between 1970 and 1990.

NC.Q: Between 1968 and 1993, was the average total Patient Satisfaction higher or lower than between 1973 and 1987?
NC.A: The average total patient satisfaction between 1968 and 1993 was {lower} than between 1973 and 1987.

NC.Q: Between 1992 and 1993, was the average total Patient Satisfaction higher or lower than between 1969 and 1972?
NC.A: The average total patient satisfaction between 1992 and 1993 was {higher} than between 1969 and 1972.

NC.Q: Between 1986 and 1990, was the average total Patient Satisfaction higher or lower than between 1968 and 1991?
NC.A: The average total patient satisfaction between 1986 and 1990 was {higher} than between 1968 and 1991.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Outpatient Visitors} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Chronic Condition Patients and Pediatric Patients first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Chronic Condition Patients and Pediatric Patients did not exchange leading positions.
